description:
No matter what side of the pineapple on pizza debate you fall on, after you taste this jerky, you will know that pineapple and jerky are true friends. Balancing the tropical sweetness of pineapple with the smoky heat of habanero peppers, this jerky will have you coming back for more. Two Rivers lets their grass-fed Canadian beef and perfected spice blends speak for themselves, curing their jerky with the minimum amount of processing.

  • Ingredients: grass-fed and finished Canadian beef, sugars (cane sugar, pineapple juice from concentrate), salt, spices, soy sauce powder (soybeans, salt, maltodextrin), habanero powder, dehydrated garlic, spice extract, natural flavour
  • Allergens, contains soy
  • Beef is sourced from farms in BC and Alberta, and is free of hormones and antibiotics
  • No nitrites added, just smoke and time
name: Two Rivers Pineapple Habanero Beef Jerky
